version_description:
- New WiFi and Bluetooth modes added.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

- New WiFi and Bluetooth modes added.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

- New WiFi and Bluetooth modes added.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

MAJOR Update!

We received feedback from thousands of people that went through many natural disasters this year, so we started working on making it easier for new users to install Bridgefy during tough times. You can now use Bridgefy WITHOUT having to receive an SMS! This will let you stay communicated even when phone services are unavailable. We recommend, however, that you do try and sign up using your phone number, as it verifies you so that your friends can know it’s really you.

We also improved connectivity, and fixed minor bugs.

MAJOR Update!

We received feedback from thousands of people that went through many natural disasters this year, so we started working on making it easier for new users to install Bridgefy during tough times. You can now use Bridgefy WITHOUT having to receive an SMS! This will let you stay communicated even when phone services are unavailable. We recommend, however, that you do try and sign up using your phone number, as it verifies you so that your friends can know it’s really you.

We also improved connectivity, and fixed minor bugs.

You can now send messages to other Bridgefy users that are 330 feet / 100 meters from you! If you need to reach someone that is further away than that, your messages will hop on other Bridgefy users until it reaches the person you actually want to text! We also improved stability and crushed some bugs.

We ask for access to your phone’s Contacts list so that all of your friends that have downloaded Bridgefy will show up on your Bridgefy Contacts list automatically. If you don’t see one of your friends on that list, it means you should invite them to download Bridgefy! To refresh that contacts list, connect to the Internet and pull-down on the Contacts section.

After you put down your phone number to get the SMS verification code, there will be a small delay of a few seconds. If a couple of minutes pass and you don’t get the SMS verification message, you can skip verification and do it later, although you won’t see your contacts until you verify your number. Note: you need to have phone service enabled for this SMS message to reach you. After that, you can use the app 100% offline!

Select one of your friends from your Bridgefy contacts list and send them a private message, or join the Broadcast section and chat with all Bridgefy users around you at the same time!

Bug Fixes and iOS 13 support.

You can now send messages to other Bridgefy users that are 330 feet / 100 meters from you! If you need to reach someone that is further away than that, your messages will hop on other Bridgefy users until it reaches the person you actually want to text! We also improved stability and crushed some bugs.

We ask for access to your phone’s Contacts list so that all of your friends that have downloaded Bridgefy will show up on your Bridgefy Contacts list automatically. If you don’t see one of your friends on that list, it means you should invite them to download Bridgefy! To refresh that contacts list, connect to the Internet and pull-down on the Contacts section.

After you put down your phone number to get the SMS verification code, there will be a small delay of a few seconds. If a couple of minutes pass and you don’t get the SMS verification message, you can skip verification and do it later, although you won’t see your contacts until you verify your number. Note: you need to have phone service enabled for this SMS message to reach you. After that, you can use the app 100% offline!

Select one of your friends from your Bridgefy contacts list and send them a private message, or join the Broadcast section and chat with all Bridgefy users around you at the same time! Please keep in mind that private messages are encrypted, while Broadcast messages are not encrypted.

You no longer have to verify your phone number in order to use the app. The app now starts up in anonymous mode, with the option of verifying your phone number later in Settings.

Welcome to Bridgefy 3.0, our biggest and most important update yet!

Times are hard right now, and people need to feel safe more than ever. We went ahead and added one of the world’s best encryption protocols into the Bridgefy App, to better protect your privacy and security. Messages are now end-to-end encrypted, so you’ll know that people using Bridgefy won’t be able to know you’re participating in a conversation, or pretend they’re someone else.

Upcoming releases will include online messaging, phone number verification, and Safety Number screens, but for now, rest assured that the most important changes to the Bridgefy App’s security are now in place!

We also improved connections, and made the app more efficient.

For detailed information about the improvements we’ve made, please visit us at: www.bridgefy.me/blog

If you’ve found Bridgefy useful, the best way to help us is by leaving a great rating and review!
